Felt like changing my review after more gameplay but seems to not changed much , most killers win just because they are faster , seen players that suck so bad and yet win because they are faster thats it , didnt out play me , nothing just got into a straight away and had no where to go , about 90% of my downs , the rest are the killers lagging so i get caught in windows that im already all the way through or i get hit by a dude not even looking my directions , its just bad , Killers Body camp at any level seen it in every match i play , they camp and tunnel the weakest link and force the rest of us into taking a hit or letting the other guy get hooked again , and theres no punishment for playing slimey you get rewarded for it ,

the game is really promising but the devs are lazy and late when it comes to game health updates, they do a great job dropping some new content to the game but the problem is the game foundation cant handle it  let me explain. every update that adds new stuff ALWAYS AND  I MEAN ALWAYS have the game broken for at least a month like how the resident evil update killed low gen pcs when it comes to gameplay and its ended console players so if you have a low end pc don't try to invest in the game cuz its really buggy and laggy and glitchy but if you have  a good pc  have fun playing it but beware that the game is kinda pay to wins when it comes to unlocking killers and survivors because it takes HOURS to unlock a new character and levelling it up

i've had this game for a while, and its a fun game. i have most of my hours in this game, but i am just tired of the game's quality getting worse and worse every update. there is so much hacking in the game and i doubt there is any consequences considering how often it comes up (i report every player). and instead of fixing those problems, BHVR just releases new cosmetics and gives free bps. please fix this, it's nearly unplayable and i haven't been into it recently for that reason.

I remember i bought this a while ago and back then only clocked in less then a hour thinking it was sort of meh, but then when you play more and have friends who play it, you realize it's quite a fun game. There's more to it then meets the eye, there's toxic killers, toxic survivors, 360ing a killer many times and finally go down just to get face camped cause he's very angry with you. Getting hit on while hooked by a frustrated kiler, getting tea bagged on by toxic survivors. none of this probably makes no sense to you, but there is a few ways this game can be played out. I'm now at 58 hours in when i only had 1 hour last year, it's easily my favorite toxic game to play when i feel like having toxicity flow through me. I recommend just because it can be super funny most of the time. Do play with friends, it makes the experience 100x better.

This game can be as in depth and sophisticated as you want it to be, but at it's core, is a simple killer vs survivors RNG-filled nightmarish party! The amount of survivors, killers, maps, perk combinations, and RNG give this game so much replay value that It's hard for me to NOT recommend it amidst it's flaws. 10/10 w/rice
